definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
perfumed toilet water/eau de cologne/floral water/hydrosol
lit. to not show the mountain and to not reveal the water (idiom); fig. to hide the key facts
pinyin: bu4 xian3 shan1 bu4 lu4 shui3

definition: a couple in a short-lived, improper relationship

sentences.english: True happiness is of a retired nature, and enemy to pomp and noise.
sentences.chinese: 真正的幸福不顯山露水，它擯棄浮華和喧囂。

sentences.english: The reed is exhuberant frosted with the crystal white dew.
sentences.chinese: 蘆葦初生青青，白色露水凝結爲霜。

sentences.english: Dew is a good thing, sir.
Moisture in the atmosphere condensed into dew during the night.
sentences.chinese: 大氣中的水汽在夜裏凝成了露水。

sentences.english: They carry toilet waters and perfumed powders.
sentences.chinese: 他們使用花露水和爽身粉。

sentences.english: White, cottony mycelia may be observed in early morning hours when dew is present.
sentences.chinese: 有露水的清晨可能會見到白色的，棉花樣的菌絲體。

sentences.english: And meet joy in these dew-falling hours.
sentences.chinese: 會在這露水降臨之時遇歡樂。

sentences.english: With pearly sweat resembling dew of night.
sentences.chinese: 手上的點點汗珠，像夜晚花間的露水。

sentences.english: Dew had fallen heavily since the wind had dropped.
Gideon rose early the next day; he squeezed the fleece and wrung out the dew--a bowlful of water.
sentences.chinese: 將羊毛擠一擠，從羊毛中擰出滿盆的露水來。

sentences.english: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
sentences.chinese: 簡化，就是消除不必要的，必要的才顯山露水。

sentences.english: They have builded Him an altar In the evening dews and damps ;
sentences.chinese: 他們披着夜間的露水爲他建了一座神壇。

sentences.english: Good to see a dew water, hair pin big enough, is a company to $ 100
sentences.chinese: 看見一隻白露水不錯，毛腳夠大，是個公要100元。

sentences.english: His shoes were drenched in dew.
sentences.chinese: 他的鞋子被露水溼透了。

definition: morning dew/fig. precarious brevity of human life/ephemeral
Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
fine rain/drizzle/poem by Tang poet Li Shangyin 李商隱|李商隐
